entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Upgrade spa-templates client apps to yaml 2.2 #47975
  • Add JSON Serialize API to support ASP.NET polymorphic serialization #47973
  • Quarantine E2E Component tests related to scrolling within page #47967
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, plainTextSansFilter, updates #47965
  • No XML encryptor configured #47959
  • The method that validates the client certificate is not executed #47955
  • I set in the server that a client certificate it is needed, but the server responses when the client doesn't include any client certficate #47952
  • Blazor - Ternary operator crashes #47943

Closed

  • B #47974
  • Randome new issue #47971
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudAddProduct, ApiCrudDeleteProduct #47930
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, plainTextWithFilter #47928
  • Perf improvement: json #47946
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #47947
  • IExceptionHandler for exception handler middleware #46280
    8.0-preview5
  • Remove support for "name" attribute for hash routing #47953
    8.0-preview5
  • MapShortCircuit causes runtime exceptions in app published as native AOT #47941
  • ProtectedBrowserStorage can't load more than 25kb #47945
  • Perf regression: https #47865

PullRequests

Created

  • [Blazor] Invoke `receiveHotReloadAsync` directly #47964
    area-blazor, * NO MERGE *
  • for CI purposes: try on-by-default #47958
    area-runtime
  • Fix DateOnly format for Input Tag Helper #47957
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Testing updated install scripts #47951
    area-infrastructure, area-commandlinetools, * NO MERGE *
  • [release/6.0] Fix HTTP/2 header decoder buffer allocation #47950
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Fix HTTP/3 and HTTP/2 header decoder buffer allocation #47949
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 7.0.x
  • Add IAcceptsMetadata to RDG #47942
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Run helix matrix tests on AlmaLinux 8 #47970
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • Quarantine E2E Component tests related to scrolling within page #47968
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview5
  • Remove debug check from fabric bot labeling automation #47972
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • Fix the aot search regex #47969
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • Fix failing routing tests #47963
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0-preview5
  • IExceptionHandler for exception handler middleware #46280 #47923
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview5
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `d42267c` to `cb12cf5` #47960
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • Re-use base project for RDG tests #47936
    feature-rdg, area-minimal, 8.0-preview5
  • Run quarantined-pr job on all release branches #47939
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • Remove support for name attribute when hash routing #47954
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview5
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `a5308bb` to `0bdaac5` #47961
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • Enable AOT template tests #47247
    area-mvc, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview5
  • Remove unused variable #47931
    area-commandlinetools, 8.0-preview5
  • [release/8.0-preview4] Add MapIdentityApi<TUser>() #47927
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-identity, 8.0-preview4

Updated

  • Add metrics to rate limiting #47758
    blocked, area-runtime
  • Add initial support for parameters with `AsParameters` attribute #47914
    area-web-frameworks
  • Update version of Microsoft.Identity.Web and Microsoft.Identity.Web.UI to 2.7.0 #47906
    area-infrastructure, area-identity
  • [release/6.0] Update Swashbuckle.AspNetCore (6.2.3 -> 6.5.0) #47860
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Replace lock with CAS #47751
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • Avoid closure in IConnectionBuilder.Use #47845
    area-runtime, community-contribution
